attributes.action: scrap the ban on smoking in pubs and clubs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The ban on smoking in pubs will fundamentally change the character of English pubs - from convivial social gatherings at the heart of the community into restaurants with beer. It will also have a drastic efect on the income of many small clubs whose proceeds promote social welfare (like miners welfares).
Non-smoking facilities can be made compulsory but with the retention of a smoking room.
